title: Roadside Sighting near Moody
observed: We were riding along cherokee road in Prescot, a comunity near Moody Al.when rounding a curve we saw what looked like an ape man but humanlike exept for the hair,which was all matted and black.it was about 7ft tall and had long arms my wife and I turned around but it was gone.
location_details: there is a boys home about a half a mile on the right from were we saw this creature.
